About Pickyourtrail Pickyourtrail was founded with the vision of making travel seamless through technology. Our platform empowers travelers to effortlessly customize their vacations end-to-end — with tech driving everything from planning to on-trip support. With offices in Chennai, Madurai, Gurgaon, and Jaipur, and a 450+ member team, we are actively hiring passionate young talent to join us in building India’s largest leisure travel brand. We are backed by marquee investors and founders such as Girish Mathrubootham (Freshworks), Sridhar Vembu (Zoho), and Kunal Shah (CRED). 1. Why This Role Exists Pickyourtrail is scaling hard and fast. We need high-agency talent who can cut through chaos, connect the dots across marketing, product, and partnerships, and move top-of-funnel metrics without hand-holding. If you just walked out of B-school and are itching to skip the corporate conveyor belt

tnerships, and move top-of-funnel metrics without hand-holding. If you just walked out of B-school and are itching to skip the corporate conveyor belt, this is your breakout chapter. 2. Day-to-Day Responsibilities ●​ Experimentation: Design, test, and analyse growth levers across GTM, partnerships, SEO, product funnels, and CRM—often simultaneously.​ ●​ AI Leverage: Prototype ways to multiply output with AI—think faster research, automated workflows, smarter attribution.​ ●​ Problem Solving: Break ambiguous growth problems into first-principles hypotheses, then pressure-test with data and own P&Ls. 3. Non-Negotiables 1.​ Systems Thinker: You see GTM, product, and partnerships as one connected stack—not silos. 2.​ 0 → 1 Energy: You get excited by blank slates and undefined problems; you create structure, not request it. 3.​ Mode Switching: Comfortable toggling between “do the work” and “d

ed by blank slates and undefined problems; you create structure, not request it. 3.​ Mode Switching: Comfortable toggling between “do the work” and “decide what work matters.” 4.​ Bias for Action + Communication: You’d rather ship a 70 % V1 today than a perfect V2 next quarter 5.​ High Ownership: You run toward accountability, not away from it Location: Chennai / Gurgaon Function: Growth Compensation: INR 10 - 12 LPA depending on the location.

Factors.AI - Account Manager Job Description Factors.AI is looking to hire members for their Account Management Team. This role will involve making prospects and customers realize the product’s value, onboarding trial accounts, managing existing customers, gathering product feedback, and analyzing product usage. But first why Factors.AI? ●​ Flexibility + learning to adapt to change: Every initiative at Factors is new and one hypothesis after another is being tested. Honestly- roles/titles, and responsibilities are often flexible. The team works as one, inventing, creating, and moving toward shifting goals - all while working with faint guidelines. This ambiguity that comes with day-to-day work will teach you to respond to change on the fly. Unlike a structured or corporate environment, where tasks outside of the scope of your job can be passed on to specialized departments, working here

Unlike a structured or corporate environment, where tasks outside of the scope of your job can be passed on to specialized departments, working here at Factors forces you to roll up your sleeves and tackle issues head-on. Not only does this make you a more proactive and resourceful team player, but it allows you to pick up problem-solving techniques and skills you might not have been exposed to in a more segmented role. ●​ Sneak peek into all things business: You will learn about entrepreneurship and generally the business side of startups- right from how to acquire your first 100 customers to how Go-to-market evolves as startups grow. ●​ Work closely with and learn from the Cofounders: Srikrishna, Praveen, and Aravind come with a variety of experiences with different skill sets. In fact, that’s what makes this founding team perfect. You can go through their LinkedIn profiles to know ab

of experiences with different skill sets. In fact, that’s what makes this founding team perfect. You can go through their LinkedIn profiles to know about their experience. ●​ Independence & flexible schedule ●​ Salaries at par with market standards ●​ Seed funded by Elevation Capital and Emergent Ventures, and backed by Naveen Tewari (CEO, InMobi) and other Cofounders of InMobi, Girish Mathrubootham (CEO, Freshworks), Krish and Rajaram (Cofounders of Chargebee), and Ramakant Sharma (Cofounder, Livspace) What will this role include and why should you be a part of the Factors’s Account Management team? ●​ Factors has achieved Product-Market fit and is rapidly scaling. This role will have a high impact on revenue and will help take the company to the next level. ●​ Understanding customers’ marketing priorities, operations, and analytics requirements and translating them into effective use o

to the next level. ●​ Understanding customers’ marketing priorities, operations, and analytics requirements and translating them into effective use of the Factors.AI. You’ll not only learn how to talk to customers but also understand how to convert them into new processes and product features/enhancements. During this, you will gather feedback on product experience during the entire customer lifecycle and work with the product team to understand how to resolve friction points. ●​ Drive product adoption, increase overall retention, and achieve process success for customers. ●​ Develop and maintain a strong rapport with clients – you will be the primary point of contact. ●​ This is also an MBA role for young graduates looking to gain practical experience in the trillion dollar SaaS business post-MBA or starting up. The role can also open into Sales, Product Management and Marketing. If yo

al experience in the trillion dollar SaaS business post-MBA or starting up. The role can also open into Sales, Product Management and Marketing. If you are stuck in a technical role at a legacy software services business, planning to do a MBA from IIM/ISB/US Univs, this might be your ideal gateway. Expectations from this role: ●​ Solid English communication skills - competent at providing clear and concise guidance through emails or calls with a casual and confident tone. ●​ Ability to scan analysis results/data and determine if something is out of normal. ●​ Strong attention to detail. ●​ Experience of minimum 1 year is preferred. We are looking for graduates to join us as part of our Management Trainee program. CreditMantri helps consumers and small businesses improve their Credit Health & Credit Scores. In India, usually, over 80% of loan applications are rejected by the lender. Credit Mantri’s aim is to help this underserved consumer understand the reasons for loan rejection, take charge of their credit health and get access to better credit products & services. The platform helps these Credit Invisible consumer segments to take charge of their credit health and take better borrowing decisions. CreditMantri is a profitable Fintech headquartered in Chennai, founded and run by a team with extensive experience in world-class financial services organizations. We are a Fintech intermediary with a Direct to Consumer platform with a registered user base of over 20 Mn consumers on the Demand side. We work with 60 plus

Fintech intermediary with a Direct to Consumer platform with a registered user base of over 20 Mn consumers on the Demand side. We work with 60 plus lenders on the Supply side. Lenders on the platform include PSU Banks, Private & Foreign Banks, NBFCs, Fintech lenders and P2P lenders. We have been a market leader and innovator in this space and amongst many things take the credit for being the first to launch the concept of a “ Free Credit Score” in the country. About the Program / Role The Management Trainee program is a special program which allows young MBAs to work across many teams and get exposed to various areas across Growth, Marketing, Finance, Engineering, Service etc. This is a key initiative and is a flagship program we run. Recruits typically are assigned to a specific department and get exposed to how the department and team functions. The idea is to groom the recruit and d

ruits typically are assigned to a specific department and get exposed to how the department and team functions. The idea is to groom the recruit and develop them into full-fledged P&L owners. Usually recruits spend 2 years in a specific function. At the end of the 2 year stint, they can opt to continue in the same role or request for assignment into a specific area of their choice. All positions would be based out of Chennai. Are you someone who: • Is passionate about your career. • Has strong conception skills to understand market needs and translate them into business goals. • Uses data to drive decision making • Has a product or process centric mindset to problem solving In Summary • The ideal candidate should be an MBA. • Prior experience would be added advantage specifically in any of the below domains: a. Decision Analytics Consultant at ZS ZS is a professional services firm that works side by side with companies to help develop and deliver products that drive customer value and company results. From R&D to portfolio strategy, customer insights, marketing and sales strategy, operations and technology, we leverage our deep industry expertise and leading-edge analytics to create solutions that work in the real world. Our most valuable asset is our people—a fact that’s reflected in our values- driven organization in which new perspectives are integral and new ideas are celebrated. ZSers are passionately committed to helping companies and their customers thrive in industries ranging from healthcare and life sciences, to high-tech, financial services, travel and transportation, and beyond. ZS’s India Capability & Expertise Center (CEC) houses more than 60% of ZS people across three offices in

ices, travel and transportation, and beyond. ZS’s India Capability & Expertise Center (CEC) houses more than 60% of ZS people across three offices in New Delhi, Pune and Bengaluru. Our teams work with colleagues across North America, Europe and East Asia to create and deliver real world solutions to the clients who drive our business. The CEC maintains standards of analytical, operational and technological excellence across our capability groups. Together, our collective knowledge enables each ZS team to deliver superior results to our clients. ZS's Business Analysis group designs and delivers solutions to help our clients tackle a broad range of business challenges. Our teams work on multiple projects simultaneously, leveraging advanced data analytics and problem- solving techniques. Our recommendations and solutions are based on rigorous research and analysis underpinned by deep expert

ta analytics and problem- solving techniques. Our recommendations and solutions are based on rigorous research and analysis underpinned by deep expertise and thought leadership. DECISION ANALYTICS CONSULTANT: Decision Analytics Consultants serve on project teams that deliver high- quality projects to clients. In particular, Consultants combine best-in-class analytic skills with strong problem- solving and communication abilities to lead analytical work to help clients solve strategic, tactical, and operational business problems. Consultants may work on multiple projects simultaneously. As Consultants advance in their career, they often specialize in a particular industry, practice area and/or client relationship. , analytical discipline, such as Operations Research, Applied Mathematics, Management Science, Data Science, Statistics, Econometrics, or Engineering. With a focus on fostering local engagement, KYN enhances daily life by bridging connections within neighbourhoods. Our Mission To Build India's true hyperlocal application, a one-of-a-kind new generation media platform that is the trusted platform for all hyperlocal information, nurtures communities, and enables a thriving micro-marketplace to empower local voices. About Optum: Optum, part of the UnitedHealth Group family of businesses, is a leading information and technology- enabled health services company serving more than 132 million consumers, delivering the right care when and how it’s needed. We are dedicated to evolving health care so everyone can have the opportunity to live their healthiest life. Career at Optum: Combine two of the fastest-growing fields on the planet - technology and health care - with a culture of performance, collaboration, and opportunity and this is what you get: leading-edge solutions that improve the lives of millions. At Optum, our approach to technology isn’t about designing another app to fix health care. It’s about connecting patients to their physician and connecting a disconnected health system so that it works better for the people it was created to serve. Our global technology team consists of more than 42,

ting a disconnected health system so that it works better for the people it was created to serve. Our global technology team consists of more than 42,000 innovators from around the world passionate about using technology to improve the lives of people and communities. We are modernizing the health care system through modern and innovative technologies, AI, comprehensive clinical expertise, and extensive experience in improving operational and clinical performance. As part of our team, you will be provided opportunities to channel your curiosity into initiative, working alongside distinguished engineers and developers pursuing innovations that improve the health care experience for everyone. text: Page 1 CARTESIAN- JOB DESCRIPTION Role: Customer Success Manager Location: Bangalore/Hybrid Company: We are Cartesian, a 15-year-old analytics firm. During this time, we’ve helped some of the largest brands across the globe unlock unprecedented value from their data. We have now forayed into the SaaS world with our first product SOLUS. SOLUS is a System of Intelligence that powers the micro decisions that a brand needs to make to communicate to its customers in a relevant manner. These micro decisions include product recommendations, reasons to talk, words to use, and timing and channel selection at an individual customer level. SOLUS comes pre-built with all the intelligence and expertise to enable this for brands within 4-6 weeks. Preferred Square (PS) About the Company: Preferred Square (PS) is a young offshore Management Consulting and Financial Advisory firm specializing in business, project, and financial advisory domains. Our team comprises of experienced professionals with extensive experience working with global multi-billion-dollar corporates and family offices in formulating strategies, streamlining operations, managing risks, delicencing investments across asset classes and enabling informed decisions. It is an offshore consulting role with exposure to international clients and global markets. 1.Job Title – Marketing Manager 2.Company description Ki Mobility Solutions Private Limited is a leader in the global automobile aftermarket and through consolidation of its B2B /B2C service and parts businesses, has built a Service platform and a Spares platform in the automotive aftermarket space. Ki's business covers digital mobility businesses in the aftermarket service, trading of automobile parts, 24x7 emergency breakdown assistance with an online-to-offline business model and is designed to become a platform of choice for global aftermarket ecosystem. Consultant, Consulting India Chennai/Pune/Gurgaon (Hybrid) Who is ZoomRx? ZoomRx is a rapidly growing life science market research and consulting company founded upon the belief that there is important work to be done at the intersection of data, healthcare, and technology. We help some of the world’s biggest biopharmaceutical companies answer questions no one else can. We support our clients through their entire business lifecycle; providing market intelligence that helps them launch new therapies, optimize promotional efforts, defend against competitive pressure, shape marketing strategies, and much more. At ZoomRx we also have various impactful products (Ferma.AI, PERxCEPT, & HCP-PT). Ferma.AI provides healthcare intelligence to pharma firms of all sizes, making it easy for teams to stay on top of their market landscape and help them make informed decisions. PERxCEPT is a one-stop sho

irms of all sizes, making it easy for teams to stay on top of their market landscape and help them make informed decisions. PERxCEPT is a one-stop shop for omnichannel intelligence in the life sciences industry, providing visibility into every digital campaign in a market from the customer’s point of view. HCP-Pt conversations is a point-of-care market insights platform that gives a real-world view of the prescribing process. Brand Builder provides holistic insights programs for new brand launches and post-launch brand optimization. At ZoomRx, we have a flat organization structure where everyone is encouraged to take risks, learn from mistakes, and continuously grow towards realizing their career goals. We offer a collaborative, environment that optimizes for the: • pride in doing high-quality work • joy of tackling creative, intellectually challenging work • camaraderie of working with

that optimizes for the: • pride in doing high-quality work • joy of tackling creative, intellectually challenging work • camaraderie of working with smart, grounded peers What will you be a part of? Consulting India works with drug commercialization teams at top pharma and biotech companies to understand their complex business needs and help them make informed decisions. The team creates strategic narratives for senior management teams of blockbuster drugs by designing and executing custom market research studies, conceiving new data analysis methods, and drawing insights from complex datasets. What does your day look like as a Consultant? • You will be responsible for turning raw data into powerful insights and delivering those insights to our clients. • You will be delivering impactful and concise presentations to clients, while incorporating cutting-edge data presentations, visualiza

o our clients. • You will be delivering impactful and concise presentations to clients, while incorporating cutting-edge data presentations, visualizations, and delivery methods. • Approach each task in a structured and logical manner, always remaining vigilant for the most optimal solutions to business problems. • Play a crucial role in multiple project teams, effectively communicating stories from data and producing high-quality deliverables that you can take pride in. • Exhibit a proactive approach to work, demonstrating a strong desire to exceed expectations and deliver exceptional results. What will make you successful as a Consultant candidate? Required Skills/Expertise: • A degree in life-sciences related/or a quantitative discipline (engineering, economics, business, statistics, mathematics). • Undergraduates with 3 to 5 years OR Post Graduates with 1 to 3 years of work experienc

(engineering, economics, business, statistics, mathematics). • Undergraduates with 3 to 5 years OR Post Graduates with 1 to 3 years of work experience in market research, business analytics, or consulting domain. • Demonstrated experience in preparing and delivering analytically robust, data-driven strategic stories. • Advanced proficiency in MS Office tools - Excel, PowerPoint, Word. • Good verbal and written communication skills. Preferred Skills/Expertise: • At least a year’s experience in project management and leading teams. • Experience in the life sciences or healthcare industry. Why should you choose ZoomRx? • You will have wide-reaching creative control and the power to make impactful decisions. At ZoomRx, we favour collaboration over hierarchy. • You will develop deep expertise in a wide range of topics within life sciences by drawing on existing knowledge bases while building

over hierarchy. • You will develop deep expertise in a wide range of topics within life sciences by drawing on existing knowledge bases while building new ones. • You will work with smart, grounded peers who are experts in their own right and thrive on the camaraderie of working in high- performance, intelligent, impactful teams. • You will join a vertically integrated organisation - with our own business consulting team, cutting-edge technology platform, and robust panels of healthcare professionals - empowered to provide our clients with highly tailored, fast, effective solutions that other consultancies cannot.

ting key decision-making processes. • Increased Responsibility: Take on critical tasks that refine your leadership, build interdepartmental networks, and enhance operational excellence. • Continuous Development: Engage in targeted training and performance reviews to further sharpen your strategic and analytical skills. Job Description: Position Overview: The Client-Facing Business Analyst serves as a key liaison between our clients and internal teams. You will collaborate with clients to comprehend their business objectives, analyze processes, and propose data-driven solutions. Your work will enable our clients to make informed decisions and drive business growth. Key Responsibilities: Client Engagement: Cultivate strong client relationships, acting as the primary point of contact for business analysis and requirement gathering. Business Analysis: Perform in-depth analysis of client requirements, business processes, and data to identify opportunities for improvement and growth. Requirements Elicitation: Gather and document detailed business requirements, translating them into functional and technical specifications for implementation through the engineering team. Data Analysis: Analyze data from variou

translating them into functional and technical specifications for implementation through the engineering team. Data Analysis: Analyze data from various sources to derive valuable insights and support data-informed decision-making. Solution Development: Collaborate closely with clients to develop and recommend practical and innovative solutions to address business challenges. Business Process Enhancement: Identify and implement process improvements, workflow optimizations, and best practices to streamline operations. Documentation: Prepare comprehensive and clear documentation, including business process maps, user stories, and system requirements. Collaboration: Work in close partnership with cross-functional teams, such as developers, project managers, and client relationship managers, to ensure the successful delivery of projects. Qualifications: Bachelor of Technology or Bachelor of E

ect managers, and client relationship managers, to ensure the successful delivery of projects. Qualifications: Bachelor of Technology or Bachelor of Engineering Pre-MBA experience of a minimum of 12 months Exceptional communication skills, with the ability to bridge the gap between technical and non-technical stakeholders. Familiarity with project management methodologies (e.g., Agile, Scrum) is a plus. Knowledge of data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., Excel, Tableau) is advantageous. Strong problem-solving and critical thinking abilities, focusing on practical solutions. Client-centered mindset with a strong commitment to delivering exceptional service. Detail-oriented, with a high degree of accuracy in work.

Role Name: Business Analyst Role Objective: Business Analyst at Propel is a key player bridging the channel between clients, end users and delivery team. nts. • Generate opportunities on improvements to achieve the desired business results which are in line with the business requirements. • Works closely with clients, C-suite, and leadership team (internal & external) in conducting for research, gathering & structing data, deriving insights and recommend solutions. • Understands data and provides meaningful insights that adds value to business process. • Works closely with both business and technology teams while learning & building the required expertise/vocabulary to bridge the gaps. Solution Design & Delivery Management: • Works closely with clients to gather requirements, define scope and arrive at the solution plan. • Writes scope proposals, business requirement document, software requirement document as aligned to client requirements, schedules, and budgets. • Accountable for the maintenance and delivery of all business and technica

rement document as aligned to client requirements, schedules, and budgets. • Accountable for the maintenance and delivery of all business and technical documents as per the client needs and Propel standards. • Supports Consulting Directors and Delivery Leads in planning the execution phase of a solution which includes team resource planning, effort planning, timeline, and other estimations. • Works closely with Creative Director and UX teams for solution protypes and wireframe designs. • Supports and shadows Architects and Delivery Leads in designing the solution architecture. • Supervises entire SDLC software analysis, design, development, unit testing and system integration and facilitates towards building reliable and viable solutions. Target is an iconic brand, a Fortune 50 company and one of America’s leading retailers. Be a part of a team as a Guest Data Platform Product Data Analyst working to set direction for the enterprise to maximize strategic value of our guest data, while simultaneously upholding rigorous standards for data privacy and ensuring compliance with current and future data privacy laws. A product data analyst will turn data into information, information into insight and insight into business decisions. Business decisions could include, but are not limited to, product feature prioritization, data strategy, use case business impact assessment, and/or A/B test rollout decisions. Product data analyst responsibilities include conducting full lifecycle analysis to include requirements, profiling, and design. Product Data analysts will develop analysis, ad-hoc, and operating reporting and dashboard capabi

ysis to include requirements, profiling, and design. Product Data analysts will develop analysis, ad-hoc, and operating reporting and dashboard capabilities. They will also monitor performance and quality control plans to identify improvements to guest data quality. As a steward of guest data, a Product Data Analyst is accountable to engage with business owners, product owners, engineering, and architecture to create data definitions, data quality rules, and exception guidelines. Classify data based on Personally Identifiable Information (“PII”) and other parameters that helps manage data as an enterprise asset. Responsibilities: Interpret data, analyze results, and provide ongoing reports, analysis, and/or dashboards that measure guest data health and product OKRs. a health and product OKRs. Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets to inform GDP roadmap. Set-up & measure results from A/B tests using enterprise testing tools. Responsible for understanding end-to-end guest data flows and identifying data dependencies in support of delivery, release, and change management. Responsible for the development and maintenance of an enterprise data dictionary that is aligned to data assets and the business glossary for the definition and maintenance of guest data landscape including overlays with the technology landscape, end-to-end data flows/transformations and data lineage. Financial Services DCG (FSDCG) primarily focuses on Core Banking, Cards & Payments, Capital Markets and Risk & Compliance industry segments. Besides consulting assignments, the team also significantly contributes to market development and innovation ideas. ion As a Domain Consultant, you will leverage your industry understanding and domain expertise to recognize key trends impacting the clients, identify transformation levers, design or contribute to the next generation IT-led solutions, and facilitate solution deployment. You may be part of or lead a small to medium sized team in this context. Additionally, you will also work on sales pursuits and market development activities, thought leadership tasks and other org-wide initiatives Role and Key Responsibilities Domain Consulting and Business Analysis • Understand complex client scenarios and functional landscape to identify problems and asses the business impact • Drive business workshops to define the scope and envision improvements. pursuits and market development initiatives, working with the sales and account teams. Consultant - Finance About At Deloitte, we do not offer you just a job but a career in the highly sought after Risk Management and Financial Advisory field. We are the business leader in the Risk Management market and work to make the world more prosperous, trustworthy, and safe. Our clients, based outside of India are large, complex organizations that constantly evolve and innovate to build better products and services, further leading to value accretion for the stakeholders. In the process, they encounter various business challenges/ problems ranging from risk management, business valuations, restructuring advisory and regulatory compliance. The work we do to help them address it is increasingly important to their success, and to the strength of the economy and public security. By joining us, you will embark on an exciting career in helping multinational clients across the globe, manag

ngth of the economy and public security. By joining us, you will embark on an exciting career in helping multinational clients across the globe, manage their business risk, manage Finance & Accounting functions, assist clients with financial reporting in accordance with ‘U.S. GAAP’ or ‘IFRS’ and work on diverse business valuation offerings. In line with the global trend, we align our work in all the above fields under different industries to enable you to become industry specialists. In the process, you will gain exposure to the challenges of a range of industry sectors and become subject matter specialists, therefore increasing your value in the specialized services market. projects that help organizations manage and mitigate risk, improve operational performance, and maximize enterprise value. or Oracle) and facilitating the use of technology-based tools or methodologies • Assisting in delivering technology transformations services to clients • Assist in the design and development of financial market infrastructure, banking and securities operations transformation, and rules and workflow engines • Exposure to implement software/programs that support the implementation of core Banking & Securities domain like Investment Compliance, Regulatory Reporting, etc. • Exposure to implement automation-based tools or methodologies to complement the solutions The Team The Financial Risk Advisory team is comprised of professionals holding Masters in Business Administration (specialization finance), Chartered Financial Analysts (‘CFA’) certification, Financial Risk Management (‘FRM’) certification, Chartered Accountants (‘CA’) certification, Certified Public Accountancy (‘CPA’) certificatio

linkedin linkedin linkedin linkedin linkedin Company Information CapitaLand Group (CapitaLand) is one of Asia’s largest diversified real estate groups. Headquartered in Singapore, CapitaLand’s portfolio spans across diversified real estate classes which include integrated developments, retail, office, lodging, residential, and new economy sectors such as business parks, industrial, logistics, and data centers. with a presence across more than 260 cities in over 40 countries, the group continues to expand its market in Singapore, China, India, Australia, Japan, South Korea, Europe, and the USA. CapitaLand Investment India (CLI India) has deep expertise across the full real estate value chain in India – from owning, developing and managing properties to fund management through CapitaLand India trust (CLINT) and private funds. The Group has a strong presence in India with a portfolio of ove

operties to fund management through CapitaLand India trust (CLINT) and private funds. The Group has a strong presence in India with a portfolio of over 20 business and IT parks, industrial, logistics, lodging and data centre assets across eight cities – Bangalore, Chennai, Goa, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, Kolkata, Mumbai and Pune. Life at Capitaland At CapitaLand, we believe that our company is only as extraordinary as its people. The people are the ones who contribute greatly to a company’s culture and its success. As a multinational company headquartered in Singapore, we stand by our credo 'Building People. Building Communities.' This philosophy has helped us to manage a footprint that spans all locations in India. Our commitment to diversity, a global collaboration to bring out innovation, people development programs, compelling benefits, work-life balance and wellness, trust and openness, no

global collaboration to bring out innovation, people development programs, compelling benefits, work-life balance and wellness, trust and openness, no hierarchy, make it a unique and great place to work. gain a comprehensive understanding of the business. • Data-Driven Decision Making: Analyze business trends, market insights, and financial data to provide actionable recommendations to senior leadership. • Leadership Development: Build and hone leadership capabilities through training, mentorship, and hands-on management of cross- functional teams. • Stakeholder Engagement: Engage with internal and external stakeholders, including senior executives, customers, and partners, to drive business outcomes. • Innovation & Process Improvement: Contribute to process innovation, operational excellence, and identifying new business opportunities in line with company objectives. • Performance Reporting: Track key performance metrics and report on progress related to ongoing projects, initiatives, and business outcomes. Pre-requisites • Master’s degree in Business Management with 2+ yrs. experience

gress related to ongoing projects, initiatives, and business outcomes. DECATHLON INDIA LOGISTICS Our Logistics Network is an integrated team of 250+ team-mates working for Different Fields of Supply Chain which includes Warehousing, Omni commerce, Import Transportation, Export Transportation, Customs, Safety and Expansion. To make your career in any of the departments of Logistics, we start our journey in the warehouse so that we learn supply chain from Level “0” catering to our entire Retail Network and hence the profile is Named “Retail Logistician” MY RESPONSIBILITIES AS A RETAIL LOGISTICIAN As a Logistics Operative, I am responsible for the speed and quality of supply to our stores and customers. ● Primary responsibility is to manage the Outbound activities which includes Receiving the Orders, Pick, Pack and Process the dispatches while maintaining space optimization using the least amount of work time, material and space in alignment to the needs of th

nd Process the dispatches while maintaining space optimization using the least amount of work time, material and space in alignment to the needs of the user (Decathlon Stores) ● Ensuring prompt, complete, accurate shipments in perfect condition ● Maintaining the highest level of service and accuracy while Reception and Inventory of the stock ● Maintaining a constant & transparent flow of information to my leader and my user. MY RESPONSIBILITIES AS A RETAIL LOGISTICIAN COACH ● Once you’ve completed your probation period of Retail logistician ● Safety will always come first and guarantee my colleagues & teammates a healthy, safe and pleasant environment according ● Pleasure in managing a large and complex team or a large and ambitious project ● “You” will be the leader of your business and will be in charge of the selection, training and development of your team. ● “You” will be responsibl

● “You” will be the leader of your business and will be in charge of the selection, training and development of your team. ● “You” will be responsible to identify your user needs (Decathlon Stores) and implement efficient solutions to address their requirements with measurable KPIs. ● “You” will be responsible for the stock inventory and fulfillment (Delivery On Time) for your users(Decathlon Stores) ● “You” will be responsible to constantly improve efficiency with process optimization and automation(wherever applicable) WHO AM I Sport is a part of who we are. Therefore first and foremost, we are looking for people to join us who are passionate about their sport. ● I possess a passion for Logistics & Supply Chain. ● I am all “hands-on” / I understand that working on the shop floor is part of my daily job and I am physically fit for it ● I have an infectious energy and relentless drive ◻

understand that working on the shop floor is part of my daily job and I am physically fit for it ● I have an infectious energy and relentless drive ◻ Vitality ● I am a team player, I generate team collaboration ● I am entrepreneurial-minded. ● I find practical and simple solutions to complex problems without sacrificing quality or core functionality, ensuring user satisfaction ● I utilize interpersonal and communication skills among various departments to facilitate a productive and collaborative work environment. ● Flexible to work on weekends regularly WHAT ELSE Sport: Sporty ◻ Passion for Sport ☺ Type of Employment: Full Time Location: Delhi / Bangalore / Mumbai

About: For more than 25 years, we have strived to be the most trusted partner for the world’s hardest engineering problems. As a global organization headquartered in Singapore, we live and work in 17 countries, with 67 global delivery centres and offices, driven by 20000+ extraordinary employees who make the impossible possible every day. We believe engineering has the unique opportunity to solve the problems of today that stand in the way of tomorrow. Quest Global delivers world-class end-to-end engineering solutions by leveraging our deep industry knowledge and digital expertise. This multi-dimensional approach enables us to solve the most critical and large-scale challenges across the aerospace & defense, automotive, energy, hi-tech, healthcare, medical devices, rail and semiconductor industries. The sales organization at Quest Global is uniquely positioned to build long term, generat

lthcare, medical devices, rail and semiconductor industries. The sales organization at Quest Global is uniquely positioned to build long term, generational partnerships with our clients. Relationships are a critical distinction for us – we’re in it for the long haul with our clients, and we invest in that commitment. We want individuals who are aspirational and are excited by the relentless pursuit of making a difference to our clients. Our Emerging Business Leaders program serves as a steppingstone for those interested in a career in sales. Job Description Job Summary: Requires excellent knowledge and experience with project management methodologies to support multi-country payroll implementations. Strong communication and cross-cultural skills to collaborate with the global team members as well as technical knowledge to set up global platform. Responsibilities: He/she is the client's privileged contact in the implementation process, working closely with Celergo's global partners to help the client analyse and implement payroll regulations in accordance with legislation and guarantee the highest level of service. Perform analysis activities for defining the required technical specifications of the information system that meet the customer configuration needs. In this respect, he/she must conduct the following actions: Conduct global kick off call, create project charters, roll out plan and project plans for all the countrie

he/she must conduct the following actions: Conduct global kick off call, create project charters, roll out plan and project plans for all the countries in scope and assuring that all the milestones and timelines are respected by the client and in country partners. Make sure client respects implementation window as per the contract agreement. Make sure all related tools are constantly updated and billing information is accurate so that customers are properly invoiced. Assist with the global implementation process, working closely with Celergo’s global partners. Analysis of the client's organisation (information channel, interface, etc.). Configuration of regulatory settings in the global ADP platform (CGC). Develop, test, and optimize the global solution according to the customer’s specifications; make sure all the steps are followed in the system to allow correct invoicing process. Organ

obal solution according to the customer’s specifications; make sure all the steps are followed in the system to allow correct invoicing process. Organize and support meetings with key stakeholders as needed to review project status, discuss, and review issues. Responsible for providing status reporting and providing responsive feedback to management and senior leadership. Provide action plans and issue resolution, as appropriate. Explain payroll (compensation, benefits etc) and its financial implications to clients. Clearly explain country specific payroll issues to clients with the help of the in-country partners. Train clients through online demonstrations using our payroll technology. Serve as a point of contact for client inquiries, invoicing, and fulfilment regarding client-impacting issues throughout implementation. Review Excel documents and verify figures using basic accounting k

oicing, and fulfilment regarding client-impacting issues throughout implementation. Review Excel documents and verify figures using basic accounting knowledge. Relay pertinent payroll information to our global partners in a timely manner. Excellent verbal and written communication skills as well as strong presentation and interpersonal skills. Ability to work under pressure while maintaining a professional demeanour. Ability to problem - solve and seek alternative solutions. Travel to client location when required. able accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. Education -- Bachelor’s or Master’s degree from a college or university. AI team in Accenture Operations focuses on how to get machines or computers to perform these same kinds of activities, though not necessarily in the same way that humans might do them. GURUKUL: CAMPUS HIRING PROGRAM 2024-25 INTRODUCTION: Ujjivan Small Finance Bank (USFB) is among the leading small finance banks in the country. As a mass market bank, it remains committed to serve the unserved and underserved segments through financial and digital inclusion. We are now a one-stop destination for financial services and offer personalised customer experience to our wide customer base. With technology as a key enabler, Ujjivan Small Finance Bank continues to expand its reach and enhance customer experience. The strengthened digital interfaces, across regions and languages has empowered our customers to seek timely and easy access to finance; at all times. This has further enabled the Bank to deepen its customer connect across diverse locations. As a ‘Responsible Bank’ we stay invested in creating a sustainable social impact through community development and financial litera

diverse locations. As a ‘Responsible Bank’ we stay invested in creating a sustainable social impact through community development and financial literacy initiatives. Ujjivan Financial Services Limited (UFSL) commenced operations as an NBFC in 2005, with the mission to provide a full range of financial services to the ‘economically active poor’ who were not adequately served by financial institutions. On receipt of License from RBI, UFSL set up Ujjivan Small Finance Bank (USFB) and USFB commenced its Banking operations from February 1, 2017. We are a ‘scheduled bank’ included in the Second Schedule to the Reserve Bank of India Act, 1934 and a listed Entity. Our IPO in 2019 was oversubscribed 170 times, and it was widely considered to be the best IPO in the last four years across the banking and financial services sector. The Bank has a Pan-India presence, with over 89+ lakh customers, 750

best IPO in the last four years across the banking and financial services sector. The Bank has a Pan-India presence, with over 89+ lakh customers, 750+ banking touchpoints across 326 districts, 26 states- as of Jun’24. Our convenient alternative channels and digital footprint across internet banking, mobile application, tablet-based origination and phone banking among others, provide 24x7 access to full services of the Bank. The bank provides more than 400 digital and phone banking services. The launch of small finance bank has brought Ujjivan closer to realizing the dream of being able to deliver a full range of financial services to the customers. This change has brought in a plethora of opportunities for anyone who desires to build a challenging career for himself/herself. We are looking for graduates to join us as part of our Management Trainee program. CreditMantri helps consumers and small businesses improve their Credit Health & Credit Scores. In India, usually, over 80% of loan applications are rejected by the lender. Credit Mantri’s aim is to help this underserved consumer understand the reasons for loan rejection, take charge of their credit health and get access to better credit products & services. The platform helps these Credit Invisible consumer segments to take charge of their credit health and take better borrowing decisions. CreditMantri is a profitable Fintech headquartered in Chennai, founded and run by a team with extensive experience in world-class financial services organizations. We are a Fintech intermediary with a Direct to Consumer platform with a registered user base of over 20 Mn consumers on the Demand side. We work with 60 plus

Fintech intermediary with a Direct to Consumer platform with a registered user base of over 20 Mn consumers on the Demand side. We work with 60 plus lenders on the Supply side. Lenders on the platform include PSU Banks, Private & Foreign Banks, NBFCs, Fintech lenders and P2P lenders. We have been a market leader and innovator in this space and amongst many things take the credit for being the first to launch the concept of a “ Free Credit Score” in the country. About the Program / Role The Management Trainee program is a special program which allows young MBAs to work across many teams and get exposed to various areas across Growth, Marketing, Finance, Engineering, Service etc. This is a key initiative and is a flagship program we run. Recruits typically are assigned to a specific department and get exposed to how the department and team functions. The idea is to groom the recruit and d

ruits typically are assigned to a specific department and get exposed to how the department and team functions. The idea is to groom the recruit and develop them into full-fledged P&L owners. Usually recruits spend 2 years in a specific function. At the end of the 2 year stint, they can opt to continue in the same role or request for assignment into a specific area of their choice. All positions would be based out of Chennai. Are you someone who: • Is passionate about your career. • Has strong conception skills to understand market needs and translate them into business goals. • Uses data to drive decision making • Has a product or process centric mindset to problem solving In Summary • The ideal candidate should be an MBA. • Prior experience would be added advantage specifically in any of the below domains: a. IT: development or project management or testing b. BFSI exposure • Familiari

ce would be added advantage specifically in any of the below domains: a. IT: development or project management or testing b. BFSI exposure • Familiarity with fintech platforms, but with the mindset and the attitude that a startup needs, is the ideal profile. Proficiency • Excel skills • Data orientation • Problem solving mindset Key Competencies • Readiness to take on challenges. • Result oriented. • Ability to work in “unstructured environment” and bring method to madness. • Taking ownership of deliverables • Someone who is proud of their professional accomplishment. • Continual focus on learning • We would like someone with strong start-up mindset / thinking, agile working models. • Other The job is based in Chennai.

Managing Partner Job Description The mandate of the role requires you to be a change-maker and a leader of sorts in the Business Track with an intuitive understanding of teaching. You should ably manoeuvre through the corridors of competition in your territory, establishing primacy for FIITJEE with a clear distinction. You should be able to win over key influencers in your territory and make them advocates and proponents of FIITJEE and its programs. You are a business leader who understands how key areas of activities intersect in business to create sustained profitability for your center. In this entrepreneurial position, it will be incumbent upon you to carry the baton of growth, emulating the founder, and remain obligated to take FIITJEE to unprecedented levels. Your role shall encompass working with FIITJEE’s entire growth apparatus, including the national leadership, Business Evange

to unprecedented levels. Your role shall encompass working with FIITJEE’s entire growth apparatus, including the national leadership, Business Evangelists, and Territory Business Heads. You will be responsible for driving enrolments in existing programs, the launch of newer programs in sync with FIITJEE Corporate, new market development through innovative outreach initiatives, diversification in furtherance of central initiatives, and deep market penetration. You will develop your center’s five-year Business & Execution plan with a growth outlook in line with that of the company. You will define and chase revenue targets of your center individually and as a collective. You will be responsible for the financial health of your center. You will individually help the Business Evangelists, and/or Territory Business Heads at your center achieve promising EBITDA targets in line with the projec

ll individually help the Business Evangelists, and/or Territory Business Heads at your center achieve promising EBITDA targets in line with the projected growth outlook. Besides the visible indices mentioned hereinabove, you will be responsible for achieving high customer satisfaction metrics, and dominating results in your territory, including unraveling the 100% potential of every student enrolled in any program. Key Traits & Personality:  You are a perfect Hipster, a Hacker, and a Hustler. You understand education intuitively and should be able to lead transformative seminars for students and parents spanning various FIITJEE programs class-wise and goal- wise.  You must have demonstrated success in an entrepreneurial role.  You must possess a comprehensive understanding of competitive & scholastic exams like Jr. Olympiads, NTSE, all Sr. Olympiads, JEE Main, JEE Advanced, CUET, and

ossess a comprehensive understanding of competitive & scholastic exams like Jr. Olympiads, NTSE, all Sr. Olympiads, JEE Main, JEE Advanced, CUET, and BITSAT. Remuneration/Annual Compensation (INR):  Fixed Component : 0.30 cr - 0.6 cr  Variable component (Performance Linked) : 0.1 cr* - 0.3 cr*(discretionary) Work experience Requirement: 10 Years with a background in Hardcore BD/Sales & Marketing/Entrepreneurship. Locations: Positions exist at FIITJEE Centres* PAN India. Selection Process:  Case study/ Assignment followed by Personal Interview  Final interviews in Delhi ( if necessary) **Compensation details mentioned here are indicative and depending upon the credential & overall performance of students during the interview.

Company Overview Fendahl is a specialist provider of CTRM (commodity trading & risk management) software solutions to commodity trading organizations. CTRM (Commodity Trading & Risk Management) Software refers to software applications used by commodity trading companies to manage their business processes. CTRM software encompasses a range of functions depending on the types of commodities being traded and the individual functional requirements of a particular trading business. Modern CTRM Software typically includes the following standard functionality; trade capture and management, physical operations (logistics), financial settlement, risk management, decision support and reporting tools. A rapidly growing global software company we have a dedicated team of 200+ staff with offices in the Americas, Asia, and EMEA, serving an ever-growing global client base across multiple commodity segm

a dedicated team of 200+ staff with offices in the Americas, Asia, and EMEA, serving an ever-growing global client base across multiple commodity segments. Fendahl offices are located in Singapore, London, UK; Sterling, USA; Dubai, UAE and Nagpur, India. Fendahl’s Fusion CTRM software is leading the next generation of CTRM solutions, setting new standards for; ease of use, flexible functionality, end user performance, scalability, reliability, and provides the lowest cost of ownership in the industry. Our customers produce, refine, market, ship and trade globally. They rely on Fendahl’s expertise in these key physical and financial markets: Oil, Petrochemicals, Metals and Mining, Coal, Road Marine Fuels, Biofuels, and Agriculture/Soft’s. Due to continuing growth following a number of new projects we are currently looking for several talented consultants to join our rapidly growing softwa

e to continuing growth following a number of new projects we are currently looking for several talented consultants to join our rapidly growing software business on full-time basis. Factors.AI - Account Manager Job Description Factors.AI is looking to hire members for their Account Management Team. This role will involve making prospects and customers realize the product’s value, onboarding trial accounts, managing existing customers, gathering product feedback, and analyzing product usage. But first why Factors.AI? ●​ Flexibility + learning to adapt to change: Every initiative at Factors is new and one hypothesis after another is being tested. Honestly- roles/titles, and responsibilities are often flexible. The team works as one, inventing, creating, and moving toward shifting goals - all while working with faint guidelines. This ambiguity that comes with day-to-day work will teach you to respond to change on the fly. Unlike a structured or corporate environment, where tasks outside of the scope of your job can be passed on to specialized departments, working here

Unlike a structured or corporate environment, where tasks outside of the scope of your job can be passed on to specialized departments, working here at Factors forces you to roll up your sleeves and tackle issues head-on. Not only does this make you a more proactive and resourceful team player, but it allows you to pick up problem-solving techniques and skills you might not have been exposed to in a more segmented role. ●​ Sneak peek into all things business: You will learn about entrepreneurship and generally the business side of startups- right from how to acquire your first 100 customers to how Go-to-market evolves as startups grow. ●​ Work closely with and learn from the Cofounders: Srikrishna, Praveen, and Aravind come with a variety of experiences with different skill sets. of experiences with different skill sets. In fact, that’s what makes this founding team perfect. Job Description: Account Manager Position Overview: The Account Manager will be responsible for maintaining long-term strategic relationships with clients, ensuring the successful delivery of services, and identifying opportunities for growth through cross-selling and up-selling. This role combines client engagement, project coordination, and strategic planning to maintain and expand key client accounts. Key Responsibilities: Client Relationship Management Act as the primary liaison for client communications, ensuring expectations are clearly defined and met. Build and maintain long-term relationships with key client stakeholders to foster trust and loyalty. Manage onboarding processes, coordinating with stakeholders for a smooth start to engagements. Operational Oversight Maintain and extend existing Statements of Work (SOWs) through proactive client engagement. Conduct daily stand-up m

ngagements. Operational Oversight Maintain and extend existing Statements of Work (SOWs) through proactive client engagement. Conduct daily stand-up meetings (internal), Weekly Status Reviews (WSR), Monthly Business Reviews (MBR), and Quarterly Business Reviews (QBR). Monitor and ensure timely submissions of timesheets, invoicing, and collections to maintain compliance and financial stability. Prepare case studies and success stories to showcase value delivered to clients. Business Development Identify opportunities to cross-sell and up-sell within client accounts by exploring untapped potential ("white spaces"). Conduct White Space Analysis to uncover new areas for engagement and growth. Build customized solutions and client-specific use cases to address pain points and opportunities. Market & Competitor Research Conduct thorough research to understand client needs, market trends, and c

ases to address pain points and opportunities. Market & Competitor Research Conduct thorough research to understand client needs, market trends, and competitive landscapes. Gather insights and intelligence from internal teams to identify challenges and opportunities. Campaign & Outreach Collaborate with Marketing and Inside-Sales teams to design and execute targeted campaigns for expanding relationships within accounts. Identify and establish relationships with new client contacts to broaden account engagement. Key Skills and Competencies Strong leadership and proactive decision-making capabilities. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage with all levels of client stakeholders. Analytical thinking for White Space Analysis and competitive intelligence. Technical understanding of products and services to offer value-driven solutions. Organizational skil

ite Space Analysis and competitive intelligence. Technical understanding of products and services to offer value-driven solutions. Organizational skills to manage client reviews, reporting, and operational oversight effectively. Strategic mindset for identifying growth opportunities and expanding client accounts. Qualifications BE / B.Tech (IT/CS) with MBA in Marketing/Sales/Operations preferred. Proven experience in account management, client engagement, or business development. Familiarity with CRM tools and market research platforms (e.g., ZoomInfo, Salesforce). Strong understanding of financial operations, including invoicing and collections. Growth Opportunity Based on candidate’s performance, they would be given opportunities to work / relocate to US offices for Business Development work.
/ relocate to US offices for Business Development work.

JOB DESCRIPTION ASSOCIATE PRODUCT MANAGER About CAMS: CAMS is a platform based service provider for Mutual Funds, Insurance companies, Banks, NBFCs. It also offers IT services through its 100% subsidiary, Sterling Software Pvt. Ltd (SSPL) renowned for IT Products powering Mutual Fund Industry in India. The Company’s products are used extensively by Asset management companies, CAMS (India’s leading MF RTA), Distributors.
